name: Statuetta oscura
desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown, one-eyed person.
You can feel a strange warmth emanating from within as you hold onto it, like the shoulder of a dear friend. Perhaps this icon can indeed give people who understand its significance the courage to carry on.

value.text:
Crafted
Dropped by Lv. 40+ Black Serpents
Stardust Exchange

customize.name: Apostolo dell'Abisso Torrenti maligni
customize.desc:
Servants of the Abyss Order that use Hydro in combat.
These silent figures are the vanguard of the Abyss, brandishing Tidal Blades that can engulf everything in an instant, crumpling armor and obliterating heretics. They shall bring preordained damnation upon the foolish masses.

customize.name: Cantore dell'Abisso Fiamme imperscrutabili
customize.desc:
Wielders of abyssal fire who pursue the meaning behind texts and scriptures. Is a member of the Abyss Order.
The surface people have a slightly distorted understanding of what their name means, calling them "Lectors," when their name can also mean "exegete." Reading the word of grace grants them great power.

customize.name: Cantore dell'Abisso Fulmine viola
customize.desc:
A monster who serves the Abyss Order and commands lightning while singing the praises of the darkness.
These are the evangelists and the scholars of the Abyss. Their violent lightning strikes the hearts of unbelievers with dark wisdom, warped by the shadowy depths of an eternal night, its violet glow proclaiming the existence of a great power that corrodes human intellect.

customize.name: Armatura oscura alfiere
customize.desc:
A pitch-dark soldier. Once a proud warrior of an ancient underground nation, it has now lost any awareness of memory.
But even so, it holds the banner of the royal house aloft into battle. Though it has forgotten its comrades or any royal blessing they might have been given, it will never lay this banner down.

customize.name: Armatura oscura rompifile
customize.desc:
A pitch-dark soldier. Once a proud warrior of an ancient underground nation, it no longer has any "intelligence" that it may still be called "human."
Yet the desire to destroy the foe and plunge into battle to defend others is etched into this empty suit of armor, even if no one remains to tell it where the enemy is or who or what exactly must be defended.

customize.name: Armatura oscura difensore
customize.desc:
A pitch-dark soldier. Once a proud warrior of an ancient underground nation, it is now nothing but a husk that only bears memories of battle.
All shall decay in the end, and this is all that is left of the Black Serpent Knights amidst the merciless march of their sins, curses, and time itself.

customize.name: Cavaliere del Serpente nero Fendivento
customize.desc:
A guard of some standing in the court, sundering the foes of the nation's rulers using a sword art known as "Truthseeker."
The Twilight Sword was once one of their number. That realm's glory has been extinguished, never again to be reclaimed.

customize.name: Aqua simulacra
customize.desc: Il colore di questo arco lungo è imprevedibile. Se illuminato, assume una colorazione cerulea scintillante.

customize.name: Frutto della sazietà
customize.desc: Un frutto che hai ottenuto da una storia degli Aranara. Serba il potenziale per scongiurare ogni crisi.

customize.name: Missiva del vento
customize.desc: Uno strumento che indica la direzione delle correnti d'aria. Non tutti gli idilli sospinti dalla brezza del vento rimangono tali...

customize.name: Haran Geppaku Futsu
customize.desc: Una famosa opera prodotta dalla scuola dei fabbri Futsu. Il nome "Haran" deriva dalla sua somiglianza con le onde violente e tumultuose.

customize.name: Kagotsurube Isshin
customize.desc: This famed blade was born in a nation to the far north. But in the name of "Isshin," it was stained with many a dark deed on its home-bound journey.

customize.name: Statuetta oscura
customize.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown, one-eyed person.
You can feel a strange warmth emanating from within as you hold onto it, like the shoulder of a dear friend. Perhaps this icon can indeed give people who understand its significance the courage to carry on.

customize.name: Statuetta misteriosa
customize.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown person.
Even though this carving has seen many years pass, it still has not been damaged in any way. It seems that its previous owner must have cherished it like some holy icon.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

customize.name: Statuetta malefica
customize.desc:
Una scultura con un occhio solo che emana un'energia minacciosa, che non lascia intendere di cosa sia fatta.

Quando guardi la statuetta, puoi quasi sentire uno strano bisbiglio confortante...

"Vedi, figlio mio. Tutto ciò che giace al di sotto del trono del cielo sarà distrutto dal cambiamento. La pace eterna del buio vuoto cingerà noi tutti nel suo abbraccio."

customize.name: Polvere stellare senza padrone
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Statuetta misteriosa
customize.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown person.
Even though this carving has seen many years pass, it still has not been damaged in any way. It seems that its previous owner must have cherished it like some holy icon.

Quando guardi la statuetta, puoi quasi sentire uno strano bisbiglio confortante...
